25.title: Fallout 3

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

25.plot: Lock down the vault and prepare for explosive premieres as GameTrailers TV visits Bethesda to deliver brand new footage and details from the highly-anticipated Fallout 3 including all new environments, a never-before-seen mission featuring the Washington Monument, the Super Mutant Behemoth exposed for the very first time and all new game play footage of new locations including downtown Washington D.C. PLUS: A brand new full motion video cut scene from the beginning of Command & Conquer: Red Alert 3, our chats with Shaun White about his upcoming video game, Amanda ...

26.title: Call of Duty: World at War

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

26.plot: This week GTTV goes back in time to check out Call of Duty: World at War. We feature co-op, multiplayer, and a secret mode in this realistic WWII shooter. Plus find out what game Neil Patrick Harris and Will Arnett appear in and a new level in Mirror's Edge.

27.title: Skate 2

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

27.plot: Grab your board, tonight we get goofy with EA and deliver a behind-the-scenes look at the upcoming titles Skate 2 for the PS3/Xbox 360 and Skate it for the Wii. We're delivering a tricked-out episode including and exclusive Skate 2 story trailer, tons of in-game footage, and interviews with pro skaters. Plus, an exclusive scene from Resident Evil: Degeneration, the official launch trailer for Tomb Raider: Underworld, a brand new peak at Square-Enix's latest RPG The Last Remnant, and join Amanda MacKay as she pays a visit to the studio of gaming's Jackass equivalent, ...

17.title: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

17.plot: We reveal new gameplay from Transformers: Fall of Cybertron, plus new footage for Madden NFL 13 and Batman: Arkham City.

18.title: Far Cry 3

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

18.plot: This week we reveal new info and footage for Far Cry 3 and Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time.

19.title: E3 First Look Special

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

19.plot: GTTV gets E3 going early with back to back exclusives. See trailers and gameplay from all your most anticipated games that will be at the E3 Expo.

20.title: Epic Games Unreal 4 Debut

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

20.plot: To round out our E3 coverage, GTTV heads to Epic to world premiere Unreal Engine 4.

21.title: Dead Space 3

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

21.plot: Revealed at E3 2012 only GTTV has the full gameplay demo of the pulse pounding action shooter.

22.title: Tomb Raider

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

22.plot: Lara Croft returns to her roots in a brand new adventure.

23.title: Borderlands 2

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

23.plot: GTTV heads to Gearbox to unveil new footage and information on Borderlands 2.

24.title: Dishonored

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

24.plot: This week we discover the choices that lie ahead of us in Dishonored with new gameplay and new info.

25.title: Valve

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

25.plot: We catch up with Gabe Newell at VALVE to talk about the Source Film Maker and much more.

26.title: Forza Horizon

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

27.title: Fuse

27.plot: Insomniac the developers of the Ratchet & Clank and Resistance series debut a brand new game; Fuse.

28.title: Halo 4

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

28.plot: GTTV drops by 343 Industries to bring the latest gameplay and info on Halo 4.

29.title: Assassin's Creed III

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

29.plot: We head to the historic district in Boston, Massachusetts to bring you the latest info on Assassin's Creed 3.

1.title: Need for Speed: Most Wanted

episode of.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: We travel to the UK to get new info and footage from Need for Speed: Most Wanted and we get new footage from Medal of Honor Warfighter.

imdb.title: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley
akas: GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley (United States)
plot: _GameTrailers TV with Geoff Keighley_ (qv) is a weekly magazine-style show focusing on the industry's hottest titles, coolest events and biggest stars.
